TopicTitle: "To the End", A Tribute to KSP 1.0 [Video Released!]

Articles.Content:
<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/3XkN7N86-SU?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Attention all! Forum user ghostbuzzer7 and I are collaborating on a video of sorts for KSP Version 1.0, and we need your screenshots!  
Anything that gives a sense of adventure, or discovery, or the journey you've had in KSP is what we're looking for. We hope to get this done before 1.0 hits the ground, so if you're interested, I'd suggest submitting something here ASAP.  
  
Video will be posted here upon completion.  
  
EDIT:  
Video Complete! Thanks to all who submitted their images, and enjoy!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-26T17:01:53Z" title="04/26/2015 05:01  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 26, 2015</time> by Starwhip**

Alright, I have 54 images for inspection:

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/11w73)

Ohhh Mad Rocket Scientist. You really wanna be in it. Well dont mind if I just left click on them and save images as... ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
Holy cow, that's a lot of pictures!

Have some rep, both of you.

my end video you can use:

 "The horrible end of Kerbin" on YouTube - The horrible end of Kerbin: [https://youtu.be/CoYO-L3OeiY](https://youtu.be/CoYO-L3OeiY)
Im glad you guys liked it ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif). Everyone is real supportive. Thank you all.

720 views in less than a month. Thank you all for supporting the making of this video ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif). Hope everyone loves 1.0.

Happy flying
